name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience in developing and optimizing high-performance backend solutions using **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, **REST APIs**, **GraphQL**, **SQL**, **NoSQL**, and cloud services like **AWS**. Proven expertise in containerization technologies such as **Docker** and orchestration with **Kubernetes**, enabling rapid deployment and scaling of applications. 
I bring a strong foundation in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, ensuring robust, secure, and compliant applications. My background includes developing enterprise-grade platforms that integrate modern practices and standards. I have successfully led teams in building scalable backend systems aligned with compliance standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS. Adept at implementing CI/CD pipelines to streamline development workflows, I leverage my technical acumen to deliver projects on time and within scope.
